description.en: More than a crypto-currency alone, SCRIV is an ever-expanding blockchain eco-system that delivers state-of-the-art Data Verification, Time-Stamping, High Return on Investment Masternodes, a Shared Masternodes Staking Service (SOS), and IPFS - InterPlanetary File Sharing Network.

status_updates.description: Hey, scrivians 👋 Quick update on the background progress — read here ➡ https://t.me/scriv_network/42392

Scriv Network 2021 roadmap is out!

👉🏻 @stackofstake, #UniversalMiner, etc.
👉🏻 What is being done at the moment?

https://scriv.network/blog/plans-for-2021/

Stay tuned for more updates 📶

Hey scrivians 👋  There are some cool news for you today 🐋

$SCRIV is now available at ZCore mobile — the non-custodial wallet for your crypto — https://zcore.app/SCRIV

Features available:
✅ Send and receive your SCRIV
✅  Hold SCRIV at multiple addresses
✅  Host SCRIV masternodes at 1.49 USD/month
✅  Sign messages in Scriv blockchain

Hello Scrivians 🙌

There are two exciting updates for you:
🔹 We are establishing the Community Fund (to be filled from StackOfStake revenue) — from now, anyone can contribute to the growth of the Scriv Network and receive the funding for contribution.
🔹 We are launching the StakeDrop feature — earn more bonuses and increased rewards by staking SCRIV.

⬇️ Full update ⬇️
https://scriv.network/blog/scriv-community-fund-and-stakedrop/

Today the Scriv team launches 📈 the trading contest in cooperation with Crex24! 

📜 Make the highest trading volumes at https://crex24.com/exchange/SCRIV-BTC to share the total prize pool of 150,000 SCRIV.
🆓 Don't miss the 50 SCRIV bonus by making at least one trade during the contest.
🕒 The contest period: 10-17 November 2020.

Learn more ⬇
https://scriv.network/blog/scriv-trading-contest-at-crex24/

We have cooperated with our partners from the ZCore Platform, and they have kindly offered 6 months of free SCRIV masternode hosting at their platform for BUY'n'HODL event participants!

Wanna learn how to get it? Read the update
https://scriv.network/blog/what-are-scriv-masternodes-free-hosting/

🚀 SCRIV NETWORK team is offering up to 10% cashback to anyone who purchases SCRIV from an exchange and holds it for 5+ days.

MORE INFO: https://scriv.network/blog/buynhodl-event/
